abilities.name: Ruler of the Night
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't play any Pokémon Tool, Special Energy, or Stadium cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Feather Storm
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Unfair-GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. Discard 2 cards from it. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
